alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cascade County through 515 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Cascade, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cascade. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 254 and 257. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central Montana.
